name: papermark
description: Papermark is a self-hosted document analytics platform that gives insights into how PDFs are viewed. It supports secure sharing, view tracking, and integrates with tools like email and Slack.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track how recipients interact with shared PDFs including page views, time spent, and engagement patterns

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Generate unique, time-limited links for document sharing with optional password protection and access controls

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive real-time alerts when recipients open, view, or complete reading your shared documents

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Send documents directly via email with tracking enabled, or integrate with email tools for automated

features.title: Slack Notifications
features.description: Connect with Slack to receive document view notifications in channels or direct messages for team
